dryopts

Class DryOpts.FoundOpt

  • java.lang.Object
    • dryopts.DryOpts.FoundOpt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DryOpts.FoundOpt>
    Enclosing class:
    DryOpts

    public class DryOpts.FoundOpt
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DryOpts.FoundOpt>
    Represents an args option that have not been matched yet.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String argument
      the argument, null==not set
      protected int argument_index
      The arguments index in args[].

      The options index in args[]
      protected java.lang.String longOpt
      A multi-character option; --option
      protected char shortOpt
      A single-character option; -o
      protected int shortOpt_index
      the number of flags before this shortOpt in the same argument.
